text: @amazon how come amazon can accuse their clients of lying. I been more than 3 hours with customer Service wanting to recover my 87 books missing on my IOS kindle app. Now after 1hr 12 min I still trying to resolve my issue. No one want to help. Shame Amazon. But, never give up.
